Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Excalibur \Ex*cal"i*bur\, n. The name of King Arthur's mythical sword. [Written also {Excalibar}, {Excalibor}, {Escalibar}, and {Caliburn}.] --Tennyson.
Excalibur n : the legendary sword of King Arthur
